channel.title: Isaac Asimov on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Isaac Asimov on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Lee Pace Has Big Hopes for the Fourth Season of ‘Foundation’
item.description: WIRED spoke to Lee Pace on the eve of the season finale of Foundation about clone consciousness, robot gods, and what’s next for the newly renewed show.
